Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a task or to-do item within a project.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Task entity.

Tarefa.description: The name or title of the task.

Responsável.description: The person responsible for completing the task.

Status.description: The current status of the task (e.g., 'pending', 'in progress', 'completed').

Prazo.description: The deadline or due date for the task.

Última Atualização.description: The date and time when the task was last updated.

Observações.description: Any additional notes or observations about the task.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project that contains multiple tasks.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Project entity.

description.description: A brief description of the project.
